mapper.select: SELECT CART_NO, ITEM_STOCK_NO, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_PRICE, ITEM_BRAND, ITEM_IMG_PATH, CART_ITEM_COUNT, SIZE_VAL FROM "CART" JOIN "STOCK" USING(ITEM_STOCK_NO) JOIN "ITEM" USING(ITEM_NO) JOIN "SIZE" USING(SIZE_NO) WHERE USER_NO = ${userNo} ORDER BY CART_ITEM_UPLOAD_DATE
SELECT ITEM_STOCK_NO, ITEM_NO, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_PRICE, ITEM_BRAND, SIZE_NO, SIZE_VAL FROM "STOCK" JOIN "ITEM" USING(ITEM_NO) JOIN "SIZE" USING(SIZE_NO) WHERE ITEM_STOCK_NO = ${itemStockNo}
